con: <p><strong>据中国台湾网报道,台北市长柯文哲日前受访表示,大陆发展强大,台湾相对落后许多。他举例,以前台湾最强的时候,GDP占对岸的45%、差不多一半,如今却只剩4.6%。柯文哲称,“过去我们已虚耗20多年,拖久了会完蛋!”此番观点获得台工商界一致认可,唯台湾“经济部”仍在嘴硬。</strong></p><p>台湾《中国时报》今日文章《两岸经济面临死亡交叉》指出,台北市长柯文哲认为大陆发展太强大,台湾落后许多的观点,岛内产学界都不否认,两边发展正处于“死亡交叉”,且对岸连软实力都在迎头赶上。<strong>而台湾“经济部”则表示,岛内科技业仍具领先优势,只要别掉以轻心被大陆赶上。</strong></p><img src="http://p3.pstatp.com/large/315a001000210ce1eff2" img_width="550" img_height="366" alt="台工商界大佬：每次从大陆回台心情都很不好" inline="0"><p>前台湾工研院知识经济与竞争力研究中心主任杜紫宸就肯定柯文哲是台湾少数愿意承认相对大陆正处于落后中的政治人物。他认为,柯指的软实力仍领先,应该是属于社会、文化、礼貌这类,硬实力则为城市发展、基础建设,这点确实都落后,甚至只能排在大陆二线城市的末端。</p><img src="http://p3.pstatp.com/large/31650009e5b110ae6b8e" img_width="500" img_height="333" alt="台工商界大佬：每次从大陆回台心情都很不好" inline="0"><p>他分析,<strong>以大陆经济成长率有6-7%,台湾10年来平均不到2%的发展,两边正面临一个“死亡交叉”,到时差距也会越拉越大。</strong></p><p>事业跨足两岸的台泥公司副总黄健强表示,台湾现在只有IT产业好一点,其他产业没有投资环境,薪资就没办法调升。以水泥业观察,大陆即使经济发展有趋缓,但还是保持相当大动能,尤其在基础建设投资上仍维持20%成长,住房投资也有9%以上。</p><p>可怕的还不是硬件,黄健强说,大陆软实力也在赶上,大陆近年在环保整治上下很多功夫,淘汰污染、没有竞争力产业,环境维护上也有提升。</p><p>台湾商业总会理事长赖正镒就直言,说的都是事实!<strong>台湾过去20年都在空转,大陆则都在拼经济</strong>,“台湾要加油啊!”他说,虽然说台湾的软实力现在还赢大陆,但是如果台湾再不努力,也会很快的被大陆迎头赶上。</p><img src="http://p1.pstatp.com/large/3162000c18768a95efe0" img_width="370" img_height="563" alt="台工商界大佬：每次从大陆回台心情都很不好" inline="0"><p>赖正镒还说,台湾过去在亚洲四小龙的地位,早被大陆给打趴,大陆外资投资金额有1800亿美元,台湾只有50亿美元。</p><p>台湾工业总会秘书长蔡练生也表示,<strong>自己每次从大陆回台心情都很不好,</strong>特别是看到大陆从中央到地方都齐心为经济打拼时,对台湾就更感忧心,“台湾真的要迎头赶上才是”。</p><img src="http://p1.pstatp.com/large/315f0009f1e15aaeaf64" img_width="500" img_height="301" alt="台工商界大佬：每次从大陆回台心情都很不好" inline="0"><p>蔡练生说,<strong>大陆有很清楚的目标,更重要的是订下目标后,都会落实,</strong>不像台湾很多计划总是喊了多年后,再回首时,不是还停在计划阶段,就是不知去处,徒留个疑问:“后来怎么了?”所以,这些年来,两岸的差距是愈来愈大。</p><p>而面对两岸经济上的“死亡交叉”,蔡英文当局“经济部工业局副局长”游振伟仍宣称,不应该只从两边经济成长率去比较,<strong>毕竟大陆从60到70分是容易的,而台湾从85分进步到90分的确比较难。</strong>但他也承认,“在我们领先的科技业上,大陆跟我们的距离正在拉近,确实我们不能掉以轻心。”</p><img src="http://p1.pstatp.com/large/315f0009f1e23529c491" img_width="550" img_height="307" alt="台工商界大佬：每次从大陆回台心情都很不好" inline="0">

According to China Taiwan Network reported that Taipei Mayor Ke Wenzhe recently interviewed that the mainland is developing strong, Taiwan is relatively backward many. For example, before the strongest in Taiwan, GDP accounted for 45% of the other side, almost half, and now only 4.6%. Ke Wenzhe said, "In the past we have spent more than 20 years, dragged on for a long time will be finished!" This time the views of the Taiwan business community unanimously approved, only Taiwan "Ministry of Economy" is still sluggish.

Taiwan's Mayor Ke Wenzhe that the development of the mainland is too strong, Taiwan's many views behind, the island's industry and academia do not deny that both sides of the development is in the "death cross", and the "cross-strait economy is facing the death of cross" The other side of the soft power are catching up. Taiwan's "Ministry of Economic Affairs" said that the island's technology industry is still a leading edge, as long as do not be taken away by the mainland alone.

Former Taiwan Industrial Technology Research Institute of Knowledge Economy and Competitiveness Research Center Director Du Zichen is sure that Ke Wenzhe is a small number of Taiwan is willing to admit that the mainland is lagging behind the political figures. He believes that Ke refers to the soft power is still leading, should belong to the community, culture, courtesy of this, hard power for urban development, infrastructure, this is indeed lagging behind, and even only in the mainland second-tier cities at the end.

He analyzed the mainland economic growth rate of 6-7%, Taiwan 10 years to an average of less than 2% of the development, both sides are facing a "death cross", when the gap will be widening.

The cause of the cross-strait of Taiwan's mud company vice president Huang Jianqiang said that Taiwan is now only IT industry better, no investment environment in other industries, there is no way to raise wages. In the cement industry, the mainland, even if the economy has slowed down, but still maintain considerable momentum, especially in infrastructure investment still maintain 20% growth, housing investment is also more than 9%.

Terrible is not hardware, Huang Jianjiang said that the mainland is also catching up the soft power, the mainland in recent years, a lot of efforts in environmental remediation, eliminate pollution, no competitive industries, environmental maintenance has improved.

Taiwan's business association president Lai Zhengyi said frankly, that is true! Taiwan over the past 20 years are idle, the mainland are fighting the economy, "Taiwan to refuel ah!" He said that although the soft power of Taiwan now win Mainland, but if Taiwan does not work hard, it will soon be catching up by the mainland.

Lai Zhengyi also said that Taiwan's past position in the four dragons in Asia, has long been hit by the mainland, the mainland foreign investment amount of 180 billion US dollars, Taiwan only 50 billion US dollars.

Taiwan Federation of Industry Secretary-General Cai Xingsheng also said that every time he returned from the mainland mood is very bad, especially to see the mainland from the central to the local are working together for the economy, the Taiwan even more worried about, "Taiwan Really want to catch up is to ".

Cai said that the mainland has a very clear goal, more importantly, set goals, will be implemented, unlike Taiwan, many plans are always shouting for many years, and then look back, not still stop at the planning stage, that I do not know where to go, Leave a question: "What happened later?" So, these years, the gap between the two sides is getting bigger and bigger.

In the face of cross-strait economic "death cross", Tsai Ing-wen authorities "Economic Bureau deputy director of Industry Bureau" tour Zhenwei still claimed that should not only from the economic growth rate on both sides, after all, the mainland from 60 to 70 points is easy Taiwan's progress from 85 points to 90 points is indeed more difficult. But he also admitted that "in our leading technology industry, the distance between the mainland and us is approaching, and indeed we can not take it lightly."

title: 台工商界大佬：每次从大陆回台心情都很不好
